dashboards.description: For all secuirty related tasks monitoring

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'Cloud Guard Source' and 'OCI Resource Name' = 'password is too old' | stats count by Resource

savedSearches.displayName: Deleted Resources by User - Threat Hunting
savedSearches.description: Deleted Resources by User  - Threat Hunting

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event like '%delete%' | stats count as logrecords by Event | sort -logrecords

savedSearches.displayName: User Logins by Geography - Threat Hunting
savedSearches.description: User Logins by Geography - Threat Hunting

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event in (interactivelogin, federatedinteractiveloginattempt) | geostats count('Source IP') by Event
'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event in (createidpuser, createuser) and Status = '200' | stats values('OCI Resource Name') by 'OCI Resource Name'

'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and 'User Name' not in ('null', 'oci-optimizer', scanplatform, taggingcontrolplaneservice, budgetscontrolplane, cloudguard, commercialservices, loganalytics, mysql, 'objectstorage-us-ashburn-1', oke, vaultsecret, 'vulnerability-scanning-service', 'system:apiserver', 'system:serviceaccount:kube-system:endpointslice-controller', osms, compute, dpd, 'ocid1.dbsystem.oc1.iad.*') | stats count as logrecords by Event
'Log Source' = 'Cloud Guard Source' and Status = open and 'OCI Resource Name' = 'instance is publicly accessible' | stats distinctcount(Resource) by Resource
'Log Source' = 'Cloud Guard Source' and Status = open and 'OCI Resource Name' = 'instance is publicly accessible' | distinct Resource
'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event = launchinstance and Type = com.oraclecloud.computeapi.launchinstance.begin | stats count by 'User Name'
'Log Source' = 'Cloud Guard Source' and Priority = critical and Status = open and 'OCI Resource Name' = 'scanned host has vulnerabilities' | stats count by Resource
'Log Source' = 'Cloud Guard Source' and Status = open and 'OCI Resource Name' = 'bucket is public' | stats distinctcount(Resource) by Resource
'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event = launchinstance and Type = com.oraclecloud.computeapi.launchinstance.end | timestats count as logrecords by 'Log Source'
'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event in (deleteidpuser, deleteuser) | stats count by 'User Name'
'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event = launchinstance and Type = com.oraclecloud.computeapi.launchinstance.begin | stats count by 'User Name', 'OCI Resource Name'
'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event in (deleteidpuser, deleteuser) and Status = '204' | stats count by 'User Name', 'OCI Resource Name'

savedSearches.displayName: Delete user attempt in OCI - Impact
savedSearches.description: Delete user attempt in OCI - Impact

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'OCI Audit Logs' and Event in (deleteidpuser, deleteuser) | stats count
